note.p: Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1948-1949 vol 6 pp 397-407, plate, by J S Foster
References: Sir Brian Pippard, FRS, 'Schoolmaster-Fellows and the campaign for science education' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 63-81, plate
R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 2. After 1847' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 47-84
